original: su sleb pa rgyal mor btang /
analyzed: su sleb pa rgyal mor btang /
translated: The place where the thread is cut is the border between the skin and the flesh.

original: sgog pa se'u gsum /

original: li shi / dz'a ti gsum cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma snum skol bar btab pa'i khu ba rna bar thigs pa gsum ri gnyis re blugs pas rna ba'i nad tsha grang kun la phan /

translated: Mix equal parts of the powders of these three ingredients, add oil, and boil. Pour three drops of this liquid into each ear twice a day. It is helpful for all types of hot and cold ear disorders.

original: ba'i 'o ma phul do //
analyzed: ba'i 'o ma phul do //
translated: Add one prastha of goat milk.

original: snum phul gang /
analyzed: snum phul gang /
translated: Add one prastha of oil.

original: rgya gar gyi dha du ra zho drug zhib par btags snum dang 'o ma gnyis skol bar btab pa lus la byugs pas chu bsags /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi dha du ra zho drug zhib par btags snum dang 'o ma gnyis skol bar btab pa lus la byugs pas chu bsags /
translated: For edema, apply a paste of six sho of Indian dhatak seeds, oil, and milk to the body.

original: pho ba spos pa na zug che ba'i rigs la phan /
analyzed: pho ba spos pa na zug che ba'i rigs la phan /
translated: This is beneficial for the type of abdominal distension with severe pain.

original: zas spyod rtsam pa dang skom li shi 'bru bdun tsam chu phor gang la spangs pa'i khu bgrang mo gtong /
analyzed: zas spyod rtsam pa dang skom li shi 'bru bdun tsam chu phor gang la spangs pa'i khu bgrang mo gtong /
translated: For diet and lifestyle, eat tsampa and drink a hand span of a decoction prepared from one bowl of water and seven spices.

original: gong gi sman rnams nyin re la 'byug thengs gnyis re byed /
analyzed: gong gi sman rnams nyin re la 'byug thengs gnyis re byed /
translated: Apply the above medicines twice a day.

original: nyin bdun tsam la grag 'gro //
analyzed: nyin bdun tsam la grag 'gro //
translated: This will cure the disorder in seven days.

original: sman chen ser po dang dung me la bsregs pa pho ril gsum zho la bteg pa'i ril bu pho ril tsam sgril ba khong du btang bas cham pa /
analyzed: sman chen ser po dang dung me la bsregs pa pho ril gsum zho la bteg pa'i ril bu pho ril tsam sgril ba khong du btang bas cham pa /
translated: For the treatment of common cold, fever, and indigestion, take a pill prepared from three sho of yellow great medicine, burnt conch, and bezoar, the size of a bezoar, after dissolving it in milk.

original: tsha ba / zam ma zhu ba rnams la bsngags /
analyzed: tsha ba / zam ma zhu ba rnams la bsngags /
translated: This is recommended for common cold, fever, and indigestion.

original: sman ma zhu na dug ril ltag pa sprad ces pa yang 'di yin /
analyzed: sman ma zhu na dug ril ltag pa sprad ces pa yang 'di yin /
translated: If the medicine is not digested, it is said that one should take a pill of poison.

original: 'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan /
analyzed: 'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan /
translated: This is also beneficial for all types of cold disorders such as edema.

original: rgya gar gyi la la phud chu la thun che bar btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa do gsum tsam btang bas shal skyug gang rigs byung na phan /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi la la phud chu la thun che bar btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa do gsum tsam btang bas shal skyug gang rigs byung na phan /
translated: If vomiting of undigested food occurs, it is beneficial to drink three cups of a decoction prepared by boiling a large dose of La la phud and Chhu la.

original: grang ba yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa la ko ci la me la bsregs pa dang la la phud shu dag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun che ba gsum zos pas phan /
analyzed: grang ba yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa la ko ci la me la bsregs pa dang la la phud shu dag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun che ba gsum zos pas phan /
translated: For cold disorders that have spread and lasted for many years, it is beneficial to take three large doses of Ko chi burnt in fire and La la phud pounded with Shudag.

original: rtsam pa rtsam thug mdzo zho'i chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan /
analyzed: rtsam pa rtsam thug mdzo zho'i chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan /

original: pho ba 'bras bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo bo gzhogs phyed na (la nad) na gang na'i mig tu dar la btsags pa'i khu ba blugs pas phan /
analyzed: pho ba 'bras bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo bo gzhogs phyed na (la nad) na gang na'i mig tu dar la btsags pa'i khu ba blugs pas phan /
translated: For a headache on one side, it is beneficial to drink a decoction prepared by straining the three myrobalan fruits through a cloth and to pour the decoction into the eye of the affected side.

original: kro ma seng ge /
analyzed: kro ma seng ge /

original: tsan dan dmar po /
analyzed: tsan dan dmar po /

analyzed: lga ser / btsag rnams brdar ba'i khu ba bal mchu la byugs pas phan /
translated: For lip disorders, it is beneficial to apply a paste prepared from these three ingredients to the lips.

original: so mar tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mtha' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan /
analyzed: so mar tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mtha' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan /

original: me la drod dugs byed /
analyzed: me la drod dugs byed /
